snippet: Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez made his first public appearance in the Capitol since allegations of sexual harassment cost him his committee chairmanship.
abstract: Assemblyman Vito J Lopez makes his first public appearance in Albany since a sexual harassment scandal engulfed his political career, forcing him to step down as Brooklyn Democratic chairman; Lopez, meeting with reporters, is typically defiant but noticeably paler as he explains his decision to return to his seat in the Assembly rather than retire.
lead_paragraph: Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez made his first public appearance in the Capitol since allegations of sexual harassment cost him his committee chairmanship.

headline.seo: Assemblyman Lopez Returns to Albany After Scandal
headline.main: A Return to Albany After a Scandal
headline.print_headline: A Return to Albany After a Scandal
